table.name: quote_cost_option_shipment
table.description: Cost option of shipment for quote

columns.name: QUOTE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the quote.

columns.name: COST_OPTION_SEQUENCE
columns.description: Option Number: Each possible cost option is assigned an Option Number.

columns.name: SHIPMENT_SEQUENCE
columns.description: Internal sequence number for shipment information provide as part of the quote option.

columns.name: IS_PRIMARY
columns.description: The Primary check box is used to specify if this is the primary leg of the shipment.

columns.name: ACTUAL_COST
columns.description: Actual cost.

columns.name: ACTUAL_COST_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID for the actual cost currency.

columns.name: ACTUAL_COST_BASE
columns.description: Actual cost in the base currency.

columns.name: START_TIME
columns.description: The Start Time and End Time fields specify when the shipment must leave and arrive by.

columns.name: END_TIME
columns.description: The Start Time and End Time fields specify when the shipment must leave and arrive by.

columns.name: SERVPROV_GID
columns.description: The GID for the service provider that should be used.

columns.name: TRANSPORT_MODE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the transport mode that should be used.

columns.name: RATE_OFFERING_GID
columns.description: The GID for the rate offering that should be used.

columns.name: RATE_GEO_GID
columns.description: The GID for the rate record that should be used. This rates the cost option leg for the given rate record.

columns.name: FLIGHT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the flight that must be used.

columns.name: RATE_FROM_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The GID for the rating from location.

columns.name: RATE_TO_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The GID for the rating to location.

columns.name: SOURCE_VIA_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The GID for the source via location.

columns.name: DEST_VIA_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The GID for the destination via location.

columns.name: VOYAGE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the voyage that must be used.

columns.name: DISTANCE
columns.description: Distance.

columns.name: DISTANCE_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Distance unit of measure.

columns.name: DISTANCE_BASE
columns.description: Distance in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: PERSPECTIVE
columns.description: Perspective - Buy or Sell.

columns.name: RATE_EXPIRATION
columns.description: Expiration data of the rate.

columns.name: SOURCE_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The GID for the source location.

columns.name: SOURCE_LOCATION_NAME
columns.description: Source location name.

columns.name: SOURCE_ADDRESS_LINE1
columns.description: Source location address line 1 value.

columns.name: SOURCE_ADDRESS_LINE2
columns.description: Source location address line 2 value.

columns.name: SOURCE_ADDRESS_LINE3
columns.description: Source location address line 3 value.

columns.name: SOURCE_CITY
columns.description: Source location city value.

columns.name: SOURCE_PROVINCE
columns.description: Source location province value.

columns.name: SOURCE_COUNTRY_CODE3_GID
columns.description: Source Location country code value.

columns.name: SOURCE_POSTAL_CODE
columns.description: Source location postal code value.

columns.name: DEST_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The GID for the Destination location.

columns.name: DEST_LOCATION_NAME
columns.description: Destination location name.

columns.name: DESTINATION_ADDRESS_LINE1
columns.description: Destination location address line 1 value.

columns.name: DESTINATION_ADDRESS_LINE2
columns.description: Destination location address line 2 value.

columns.name: DESTINATION_ADDRESS_LINE3
columns.description: Destination location address line 3 value.

columns.name: DESTINATION_CITY
columns.description: Destination location city value.

columns.name: DESTINATION_PROVINCE
columns.description: Destination location province value.

columns.name: DESTINATION_COUNTRY_CODE3_GID
columns.description: Destination Location country code value.

columns.name: DESTINATION_POSTAL_CODE
columns.description: Destination location postal code value.

columns.name: SHIPMENT_TYPE_GID
columns.description: Indicates the shipment type for this quote cost option shipment.

columns.name: NFRC_RULE_GID
columns.description: The NFRC rule used to create this shipment if it is an NFRC and was created by the system.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
